mail.joja.intro: Dear @,^^Congratulations! As a valued member of the Joja community, you've been pre-approved for our Joja AgriLease™ Tractor Rental Program!^^Why break your back with a hoe when Joja's state-of-the-art farming machinery can do the heavy lifting? For just a small daily fee, a certified Joja tractor will be delivered straight to your farm — no garage required, no long-term commitment, no questions asked!*^^Simply visit your mailbox to access the loan service.^^Work smarter. Work Joja.™^^— Joja Corp. Customer Retention Division^^*Tractor must be returned by end of business day. Joja Corp. is not responsible for crop damage, fence destruction, or existential dread caused by corporate farming equipment. Daily fee is non-refundable. Terms subject to change without notice.
mail.pierre.intro: Dear @,^^Pierre here! I noticed you've been working hard on your farm and thought I'd let you know about my new farm equipment rental service.^^For a small daily fee, I can arrange for a tractor to help out on your farm. Just visit your mailbox and select the rental option!^^— Pierre

config.loan_cost_per_day.name: Loan Cost Per Day
config.loan_cost_per_day.tooltip: Gold cost per day to loan the tractor.
config.max_loan_days.name: Max Loan Days
config.max_loan_days.tooltip: Maximum number of days the tractor can be loaned.
config.default_loan_days.name: Default Loan Days
config.default_loan_days.tooltip: Default number of days selected when loaning.
config.charge_upfront.name: Charge Upfront
config.charge_upfront.tooltip: If enabled, the full duration fee is charged when loaning. If disabled, charged daily.
config.allow_loan_with_garage.name: Allow Loan With Garage
config.allow_loan_with_garage.tooltip: If enabled, allow loaning even when the player already owns a tractor garage.
config.show_mail_daily.name: Show Mail Daily
config.show_mail_daily.tooltip: If enabled, the Joja mail reappears daily. If disabled, only sent once.
config.dismiss_service.name: Dismiss Service Permanently
config.dismiss_service.tooltip: If enabled, the player has opted out of the Joja tractor mail entirely.
config.require_minimum_gold.name: Require Minimum Gold
config.require_minimum_gold.tooltip: If enabled, the mail only appears if the player has enough gold to cover the fee.
config.enable_late_return_penalty.name: Enable Late Return Penalty
config.enable_late_return_penalty.toolti: If enabled, a penalty is applied if the tractor is returned after 2:00 AM.
config.late_return_penalty.name: Late Return Penalty
config.late_return_penalty.tooltip: Bonus gold charged for late return (passing out with tractor).
config.enable_speed_reduction.name: Enable Speed Reduction
config.enable_speed_reduction.tooltip: If enabled, the loaned tractor moves slightly slower than an owned tractor (Joja cuts corners).
